title: "Johnson v. M'Intosh and the Missing Cover of the Jigsaw Puzzle"
abstract: “A Close Up View of a Puzzle Piece” by Pierre Bamin (Unsplash license). This article is part of our “200 Years of Johnson v. M’Intosh: Law, Religion, and Native American Lands” series.If you’d like to check out other articles in this series, click here.
